thread.title: Disha Patani's Instagram Is Every Dance Lover's Dream Come True
thread.title_full: Disha Patani's Instagram Is Every Dance Lover's Dream Come True

author: Andre Borges
title: Disha Patani's Instagram Is Every Dance Lover's Dream Come True
text:
ID: 10625165 2. A few days ago, she went viral for a dance video of her absolutely killing it to Ed Sheeran’s “Shape Of You”. I mean, just look at her go. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10625033 3. The video, unsurprisingly, reached a million views in just three days, and was also covered by dozens of publications. View this image ›
google.co.in ID: 10625042 4. While this video was propelled to virality by Patani’s recent acclaim, she’s been low-key killing it literally every time she busts a move. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10625045 5. Between doing movie promos and walking the ramp at fashion shows… Instagram: @dishapatani
Getty Images
 ID: 10625054 6. She’s pretty much always in the studio, training with The Middle Beat Dance Company, slaying it song after song. Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @dishapatani ID: 10625071 7. She mostly collabs with Harsh Vardhan Khemka, a celebrity dance trainer. And together they are fuckin’ . Loading View on Instagram
Instagram: @dishapatani ID: 10625057 8. So please enjoy all the videos in this post as a testament to the absolute beast Disha Patani is on the dance floor. Loading View on Instagram
instagram.com ID: 10625084 Check out more articles on BuzzFeed.com!
 More News About Rihanna Andre Borges is a social news reporter for BuzzFeed and is based in Mumbai.
